tutor.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: someone who gives private lessons to one student or a small group, and is paid directly by them
tutor.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The children were educated at home by a succession of tutors.
tutor.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a teacher in a British university or college
tutor.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: She was my tutor at Durham.
tutor.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to teach someone as a tutor
tutor.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Young men were tutored in the art of handling horses.
